channel.title: Need help with Server creating!
channel.description:
[b]im creating TestScape server with name ZapScape. Its were some questions.[/b] 1. How set npcdrops? i set those but monsters in serv didnt drop anything.. 2. How set place where u dead spawned. 3. How set side where npcs watching? they all watching to 1 side :/ 4. How to set commands? example ::icewarriors 5. How to make places where u've been teled from commands?. 6. How to set serv name on top of screen, and admin nick in ::rules or ect.
Thats all. i need ur all help. :confused: thx ;)

item.title: Need help with Server creating!
item.dc:creator: @the_zap the zap
item.description:
@the_zap wrote:

im creating TestScape server with name ZapScape.
Its were some questions.

  1. How set npcdrops? i set those but monsters in serv didnt drop anything…
  2. How set place where u dead spawned.
  3. How set side where npcs watching? they all watching to 1 side
  4. How to set commands? example ::icewarriors
  5. How to make places where u’ve been teled from commands?.
  6. How to set serv name on top of screen, and admin nick in ::rules or ect.

Thats all. i need ur all help.
thx
